channel.title: Hi there on Jasper de Winther
channel.description: Recent content in Hi there on Jasper de Winther

item.title: Advanced Graphics @UU
item.description: This course was one of the major reasons why I wanted to do my master’s at Utrecht University, and it delivered. For the first time I could work on a ray tracer with the help of a very good and dedicated lecturer, namely Jacco Bikker. During the course we first implemented a Whitted style raytracer (on the CPU). I was pleasantly surprised with the performance as I thought nothing could be rendered (let alone ray traced) on the CPU.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m currently a first year master’s student at Utrecht University studying Game and Media Technology. Previously I studied at Technical University Eindhoven, Hogeschool Utrecht and have done internships at VicarVision and Sentient Information systems. I enjoy working on real time systems such as computer vision, graphics or machine learning. In my spare time I enjoy bouldering, programming, calisthenics, cooking and playing/analyzing games.
